name: webgl2
description: WebGL2 tools to derisk large GPU projects on the web beyond toys and demos.

scripts.build: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && node -e "fs.copyFileSync('target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/webgl2.wasm', 'webgl2.wasm')" && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --features coverage --release && node -e "fs.copyFileSync('target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/webgl2.wasm', 'webgl2.debug.wasm')" && cargo run --bin distill_wasm --features cli --target aarch64-pc-windows-msvc -- webgl2.debug.wasm --output webgl2.debug.wasm
